testcase.name: Login to Quick Assist Application through Ping Page
testcase.system-out: Given My WebApp 'QuickAssist_App' is open...................................passed When I select option 'QuicAssist Token EXternal' in dropdown 'SelectAuthenticationSystem' by 'text'.passed And I click 'ContinueBtn'...................................................passed And I enter 'SQAtest2' in field 'Ping_Username'.............................passed And I enter 'PSCU@1234' in field 'Ping_Password'............................passed And I enter '2113' in field 'Ping_ClientId'.................................passed And I click 'Ping_LogIN'....................................................passed Then I should see text 'sqatest2.21' present on page at 'QAssist_UserNameDisp'.passed Then I wait for '10' seconds................................................passed
